channel.title: CVE Feed for CryoutCreations -- Mantra

item.title: CVE-2024-44056|2024-09-15T08:18:20.298Z -- cryoutcreations -- mantra
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CryoutCreations Mantra allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Mantra: from n/a through 3.3.2.
